Boyt Harness Company, the hunting industry standard for gun cases and firearm storage and transport, traces their beginnings to a family owned regional harness shop in turn of the century Iowa. The industrious Boyt brothers founded Walter Boyt Saddlery in 1901.

s: September 8, 2024 - Today, under the leadership of Tony Caligiuri, Boyt Harness Company continues to build on its legendary past while looking ahead to the future. Tony’s connection to Boyt’s history runs deep—his uncles served in the Pacific during WWII and were issued Boyt gear straight from the factory just a few blocks from their home.
